title: Soundz of the Asian Underground (Big Papi) 1997
description:
By A Customer 
[quote]This is a wonderful album, full of luscious beats and voices. If any of you remember that Philips c.d. burner commercial where the guy makes a club mix, brings it to a club, d.j. puts it on, and an angelic voice follows, while he and this girl dance...anyway that's the first song on the album, and that's Amar's amazing voice. If you just want to be consumed by beats and entranced for about and 70 minutes, pop this baby in. I consider it one of the finest c.d.'s I own, and I thoroughly recommend it to everyone. I had no idea what it was when I purchased it, it just looked interesting, and it was a wonderful surpriYy[/quote]

[img]http://image.bayimg.com/31f75bead70d23a05af3d421672f63125372c3b2.jpg[/img]
